registration.part1: To participate in the private storo08 Twister Races, you must register on RedStar with promo code: storo08.
registration.part2: After registering, you must provide your username and nickname in the race topic on the vigorish.ru forum, or by writing to me on Telegram.
registration.part3: After reviewing your entry, you are automatically included in the private race leaderboard. There is no need to re-apply for this race.

rules.part1: The storo08 Twister Races Private Race runs in parallel with the iPoker Online Race every week from Monday 00:00 GMT to Sunday 23:59 GMT.
rules.part2: You must confirm your participation weekly in order to race in the Leaderboards tab of the RedStar client.
rules.part3: Prizes and bonuses are credited to the account every Monday.
rules.part4: You can't change your nickname during the race. If you change your nickname, to continue participating in a private race, you must report it in the race topic on the vigorish.ru forum, or by writing to me on Telegram.
